duration_raw: until the start of your next turn
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 10" pfs="Standard">[Indestructibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=699)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 221 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the start of your next turn
</row>

</column>

---

You can't be affected by anything unless you choose to be. For the duration of the spell, you are immune to any effect or damage that would harm you, excluding effects caused by [artifacts](/equipment/artifacts), deific power, and similarly powerful sources. You can still be affected by anything you're willing to have affect you.
name: Indestructibility
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 221 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

**Duration** until the start of your next turn
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Become briefly immune to everything.
</summary>
text: Indestructibility Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 221 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Duration until the start of your next turn --- You can't be affected by anything unless you choose to be. For the duration of the spell, you are immune to any effect or damage that would harm you, excluding effects caused by artifacts, deific power, and similarly powerful sources. You can still be affected by anything you're willing to have affect you.
